data.title: Mentor
data.description: I participated as a mentor in Skills for Women by the British Council. The program took place between January and August 2022 and consisted of a minimum of 12 hours of tutoring.

data.title: Software Developer
data.description:
I worked as a software developer developing the landing page of the company, as well as its administration system.
I did things like sending email with AWS, deploying Django servers with Heroku, databases on AWS, and storage with AWS S3.

data.title: BioMedTech Baja Hackathon
data.description: I participated in the BioMedTech Baja Hackathon and together with my team we developed an Uber-like application for ambulances, this with the use of Flutter and socket.io

data.title: GitHub Campus Expert
data.description: I currently belong to the GitHub Campus Experts Community, where I host activities and events for the school community on my campus, as well as attend GitHub Education workshops for community members.

data.title: Software Developer
data.description: I did things like sending email with AWS, deploying Django servers with Heroku, databases on AWS, and storage with AWS S3.

data.title: Software Engineer
data.description:
I implemented technologies such as Web RTC and Sockets to develop applications in real time. I worked with payment gateways like Stripe on the client side (Frontend)
I work with technologies like React JS and Next JS to develop web applications, as well as landing pages with the use of SSR
I worked with Strapi to develop APIs to be consumed by web clients.

data.title: Software Engineer
data.description: I work as a Software Engineer in the company, developing applications with the MERN stack, as well as other technologies like AWS, Bitbucket, Git, etc.

data.title: Data Scientist
data.description: I worked as a Data Scientist in the company, with technologies like Python, Pandas, Numpy, etc.
